Title: Replaces the term addict with the term person with substance use disorder
Summary: Replaces the term addict with the term person with substance use disorder.
LawCode: Amd ยง3351, Pub Health L (as proposed in S.3416-D & A.5892-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to replacing the term addict with the term person with substance use disorder
